description:
Best Buy: https://www.bestbuy.com/site/asus-rog-ally-x-7-120hz-fhd-1080p-gaming-handheld-amd-ryzen-z1-extreme-processor-24gb-with-1tb-ssd-black/6583218.p?skuId=6583218
ASUS Online Store: https://shop.asus.com/us/rog/90nv00f1-m002f0-rog-ally-x-2024.html

Hands on the new ROG Ally X, ASUS's premium Windows gaming handheld. With double the battery capacity, improved cooling, and some nice ergonomic tweaks, it's a significant step up from the original Ally. While it's not cheap at $800, it just might be the best Windows 11 PC gaming handheld on the market right now.
